reviewText:
LASER MOON: Featuring former porn star Traci Lords, the "Laser Moon Killer" uses a surgical laser to kill his beautiful victims every full moon. In order to stop the carnage, a rookie cop must use herself as bait for the perverted murderer, hoping the plan lures him out into the open--and lands him behind bars!
HOW AWFUL ABOUT ALLAN: A blind man tormented with guilt for his father's death by fire is manipulated by his sadistic sister.
NIGHT CALLER: Two ex-football players concentrate on living the good life in Miami. In their spare time, they're private eyes, but their partying lifestyles are thrown for a loop when they accept a mysterious challenge from an exotic beauty.
KISS DADDY GOODNIGHT: A woman who picks men up only to rob them meets her match in a man who wants her all to himself. This suspenseful drama features Uma Thurman (DANGEROUS LIAISONS) and Steve Buscemi (IN THE SOUP, ARMAGEDDON).
